body:
I've set up new mailing lists on radiance-online.org for DAYSIM
(radiance-daysim) and OpenStudio (radiance-openstudio).  This email is a
test of the radiance-daysim mailing list.
I've manually subscribed a few individuals (if you're getting this first
message, you've been manually subscribed).
Users will be able to subscribe themselves by going to
http://www.radiance-online.org/community/mailing-lists


Andy
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-daysim/2012-August/000015.html).</sup>
